title: Jackie 'O' Henderson takes a shine to Bachelorette's Jamie Doran
text:
Jackie 'O' Henderson appears to have taken a shine to a suitor on The Bachelorette.

After firefighter Jamie Doran, 39, featured in the early trailers for Angie Kent's season this month, the 44-year-old was one of the first fans to follow him on Instagram.

Sydney-based Jamie, who is one of the oldest contestants on Angie's season, was already following Jackie, with the pair now able to exchange private messages.

See something you like? Single Jackie 'O' Henderson (left) appears to have taken a shine to hunky Bachelorette firefighter Jamie Doran (right)

Interestingly, Jackie is yet to follow any of the other 19 contestants set to star on Angie's season of the dating show, after they were revealed in full on Sunday.

Whereas Jackie often becomes friendly with reality stars as they appear on The Kyle & Jackie O Show, it's doubtful she's met Jamie yet, who is yet to do any radio promo.

This suggests that mum-of-one Jackie, who split from husband Lee after 15 years of marriage last October, may have her sights set on the reality TV contestant.

Does she 'like' him? After firefighter Jamie Doran, 39, featured in the initial trailers for Angie Kent's season this month, the 44-year-old was one of the first fans to follow him on Instagram

Her favourite! Interestingly, Jackie is yet to follow any of the other 19 contestants set to star on Angie's season of The Bachelorette, after they were revealed in full on Sunday

Little is currently known about Jamie, whose virtually empty Instagram features only a handful of scenic photographs taken while traveling.

Speaking to 10 Daily, he claims his proudest achievement is travelling to 116 countries around the world, across all seven continents.

The 39-year-old adds that he is now ready to settle down, and says it was Angie's 'sense of adventure' that attracted him to the Channel 10 dating show.

Moving on! This suggests that mum-of-one Jackie, who split from husband Lee (pictured) after 15 years of marriage last October, may have her sights set on the hunky reality star

Could he win? Jamie looks set to make a big impression on Angie on The Bachelorette

Jamie looks set to make a big impression on Angie on The Bachelorette.

During his red carpet arrival, the firefigher arrives in a vest top while holding a puppy, with both his muscles and the animal appealing to Angie.

'You have already won my heart, I can't even think of anything else right now, you've won, do you want the rose?,' gushed the former Gogglebox star.

The Bachelorette premieres on Channel 10 at 7:30pm on Wednesday

Quick way to her heart! During his red carpet arrival, the firefigher arrives in a vest top while holding a puppy, with both his muscles and the animal appealing to Angie
description: Jackie 'O' Henderson appears to have taken a shine to a suitor on The Bachelorette.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
